name: oops...0VERL0AD
description:
oops...0VERL0AD was made in 72 hours for the Wowie! Jam 3.0 

Theme: Failure is Progress

oops...0VERL0AD is a simulation puzzle game. Scientists have made a big mistake causing all robots to explode after a certain amount of time. Use the items given to you to kill all the robots and as little humans as possible (even Johnny should be allowed to live, right?)

Kill all the robots to proceed to the next level!

How it fits the theme: The scientist have messed up and need to destroy their robots, their hard work, to survive. Which makes it so you need to let your robots die to proceed. And that's how it's failure to proceed! A bit more abstract maybe, but still very much the thought behind it!

Controls: Left Mouse Button and Right Mouse Button

Everything was created during the jam by: TheShelfman

Art from several asset-packs which can be found in the credits.
